sorters

Class AbstractSorter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorters.AbstractSorter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    QuickSorter, SelectionSorter

    public abstract class AbstractSorter<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstraction over the idea of a sorter. Concrete subclasses should sort the list into ascending (smallest-first) order, using the provided Comparator.
    Author:
    liberato

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractSorter(SwapList<T> list, java.util.Comparator<T> comparator)
      Constructs a new sorter, using the given list and comparator.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract SwapList<T> sort()
      Sorts the associated list in-place, and returns a reference to it.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
